Binary

class gyrelc.Binary(component_1, component_2, **kwargs)

This is a class representation of a tidally interacting binary system. It is a combination of two gyrelc.Star classes, augmented by several user-input binary parameters and the optional irradiation scheme (Burkart 2016?) as inherited by gyrelc.Irradiation

Parameters

  • component_2 (component_1,) – Class representations of the binary components whose tidal interactions will be simulated and visualized

  • omega_orb (float) –

  • omega_orb_units (str, optional) – default is ‘CYC_PER_DAY’

  • a (float) –

  • a_units (str, optional) – Default is ‘SOLAR’ but user may specify ‘CGS’ (centimeters) instead

  • e (float) –
